title: Teamfight tactics ranked LP is bugged
body: My LP has not changed for the past 5 ranked games that I played.

replies.body:
For the sake of tracking down where and why this is happening, could I ask you to get more specific? 

A rough time (+ timezone) of any games played that were affected would be fantastic, along with where you placed and if you were in a premade or not.

Im not sure how i can remeber all the games and when i played them because there is no way of me finding out when they were played. but i do know that i rarely loose and most my wins are 1st placed. I played 3 games today of TFT with first giving me LP but the next two games didn't. Both the games were wins with one coming 3rd and the other coming 1st. the time was between 6 to 11 australian time and none of the games i play are premade. this is relly frustrating for me and i should be a much higher rank than i am now.
I was hoping some of the other people affected might get back to me too but thanks for the info, I'll pass it on.

I have played about 4 games, placed in the top three on all of them and my LP has not changed. Really wish there was a match history for TFT so we could have something to back this up when this happens to us.

Yeah itâ€™s definitely buggy and am surprised that not many people are talking about it.
Played like 5 won and lost no change and another time it works fine really weird.

For the sake of tracking down where and why this is happening, could I ask you to get more specific? 

A rough time (+ timezone) of any games played that were affected would be fantastic, along with where you placed and if you were in a premade or not.
